description: jOOQ is an innovative solution for a better integration of Java applications with popular databases like Oracle, Microsoft SQL Server, IBM DB2, or SAP Sybase. When using jOOQ, our customers benefit from a significant added value and ROI as their software developers can express database queries in a much simpler and faster way. From our experience, this leads to a 10% - 20% decrease of programming effort, which again leads to higher quality and to a lower error rate in program code, and thus in the entire application.
